text:
Guardrails and Amazon Bedrock
are a way to ensure

that your applications are using
AI responsibly and safely.
And with guardrails,

customers can layer on,
on top of all of the safety

and abuse prevention
capabilities that we provide,

and the safety features
that the models provide,

customers can actually
define policies

that ground their applications
in their data,

and ensure that the questions
that are asked, the prompts

that are provided to the model,
and the responses

that come back,
are safe and relevant.
And this reduces hallucination.

We've seen up to an 85%
reduction over what's provided
in the base models.

And then in addition
to guardrails,

we provide a contextual
grounding capability.
And this allows customers

to really think about
the application end-to-end
and ensure that the knowledge

that's being provided
to the prompts,

the prompts themselves,
and the responses
are all relevant

to the topic matter
and the subjects
that are being asked about.
And this provides up to

a 75% additional reduction
in hallucinations.

And the goal of all
these capabilities

is to make it easy and safe
for our customers to put generative AI

to work in production
to drive business value.
